Posts.Content: Jun 3, 2012 05:23AM vineyardsdr wrote: I would get it out. I started havng breast lumps 32 years go. I can still here my surgeon's voice,"you don't know what you have till it is held in your hand".Â  I am having my 5th surgery next Friday. I am scared for some reason this time. Surgery is not a bad thing though. My lumpectomy will be as an outpatient service, so no overight stays, will take about and hour and a half. But knowing it is no longer in my body gives me great peace, regardless of what it turns out to be. Please don't wait.
